author: dain
msg: Removed dependency on custom patched version of spring
Named constructor args are now completely handled with the NamedConstructorArg post processor
Dependency extraction for a standard spring bean definition work much better
Vastly simplified the code that converts between geronimo and spring bean definitions
Conversion code takes advantage of named constructor args, default property values, and lifecycle detection
ObjectNameBuilder now follows the geronimo convention of putting config id in module name and not application name

author: dain
msg: Wired in support for named constructor args and better object name generation

author: dain
msg: Copy over the *.properties files in test sources to the test-classes dir

author: dain
msg: Added support for named constructor args in spring using metadata providers
Added processor which extracts object name for beans from the property "gbean-objectName"
Added lifecycle detector so lifecycle callback methods don't have to be defined in each bean definition
Added visitor for spring bean definitions

author: dain
msg: Added bootstraping code for a geronimo server using a spring configuration file for startup
